name: TRI-PONG
description:
It's Pong... but for three players.

Features:

  • Local Multiplayer from 0-3 Players each with 9 lives.
  • Bots with 4 difficulty levels.
  • The faster the ball, the more points it is worth.
  • Last man standing wins.

Notes:

  • Resolution fixed to 1000x1000. Windowed by default.
  • Keyboard only.
  • Download contains a Windows Installer exported from GameMaker.
